title: Butterfield 8
cast: Elizabeth Taylor, Laurence Harvey, Eddie Fisher, Dina Merrill, Mildred Dunnock, Betty Field, Jeffrey Lynn, Susan Oliver
description: Elizabeth Taylor won an Oscar as Gloria Wandrous, a stylish call girl who yearns to go straight, especially after she thinks she's found Mr. Right.

title: Jis Desh Men Ganga Behti Hai
cast: Raj Kapoor, Padmini, Pran, Chanchal, Lalita Pawar, Raj Mehra, Tiwari, Nana Palsikar, Nayampally, Sulochana Chatterjee
description: Falling in with a band of outlaws during a holy pilgrimage, a country boy tries to change their violent ways ahead of a showdown with the authorities.

title: Ocean's Eleven
cast: Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr., Peter Lawford, Angie Dickinson, Richard Conte, Cesar Romero, Patrice Wymore, Joey Bishop
description: Frank Sinatra leads an all-star cast as Danny Ocean, who decides to knock over a few casinos on the Las Vegas Strip with his buddies.

title: Singapore
cast: Shammi Kapoor, Padmini, Maria Menado, Shashikala, Agha, K.N. Singh, Madan Puri, Helen
description: When his employee disappears in Singapore, Shyam travels from India to investigate the absence and becomes entangled in a deadly plot.
